links.title: Apple Car Project Loses Another Key Executive: Analyst Says 2022 'Make-Or-Break' Year For EV Ambitions
links.description: Apple, Inc.'s (NASDAQ: AAPL) self-driving car project, named "Project Titan" has been a non-starter due to multiple issues. The team has seen a mass exodus of executive talent, apparently reflecting uneasiness over the long overdue nature of the plan.

links.title: Stock Volatility Analysis
links.description: Stock volatility is calculated from the historical prices of equity instruments and shows the degree of variability in the returns. In the context of Modern Portfolio Theory, the risk-return relationship is the theoretical association between the performance expected from investment and the amount of risk assumed in that investment.

body: $AAPL  🍏 ❗️Alert:  Bloomberg’s “Note” out Today:  Folks, the Hon Hai “Record Breaking Assembly Forecasts for Q1 2022”, would translate into Record Breaking #s for Apples Qtr ending March 31 2022.  This “Preview, is a Window into AAPL’s Guidance for the next Qtr”…ahead, of Thurs’s Earnings Report.  Interestingly, this “Debby Wu” Note, is much different from her usually “negative channel check reporting”.  This Note is not based “on unnamed sources”…rather, this relates to “Company Announcement made to employees Today”.

message.body: $TSLA $MSFT $AAPL  “Speculative Attack” on all the Tech stocks by bears from the beginning of 2022.  I expect a “V” shape market recovery this week hoping Tesla, Microsoft and Apple all tech companies beat market expectations and provide strong earning reports and guidance. Market will be rallying significantly then undoubtedly.
